Package com.example.user_manager_v1

Class CompanyListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<CompanyListAdapter.ViewHolder>
      • com.example.user_manager_v1.CompanyListAdapter
  • public class CompanyListAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<CompanyListAdapter.ViewHolder>
    Adapter class for displaying a list of companies in a RecyclerView. Provides a way to listen for like button clicks on each item in the list. Uses SharedPreferences to retrieve the name of the currently logged in candidate. Uses Volley to send a POST request to an API endpoint when the like button is clicked.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  CompanyListAdapter.OnCompanyLikeClickListener
      Interface for listening to like button clicks on each item in the list.
      static class  CompanyListAdapter.ViewHolder
      ViewHolder class for holding views of each item in the list.
